56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:In the life-time of the Prophet, Abu Talha did not fast because of the Jihad, but after the Prophet (ﷺ) died I never saw him without fasting except on `Id-ul-Fitr and `Id-ul-Aclha

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اخْتَارَ الْغَزْوَ عَلَى الصَّوْمِ
